name: ccna-study-guide
description: Interactive CCNA 200-301 study guide with modern build pipeline

scripts.bundle: cat js/ccna-study-guide-config.js js/security-utils.js js/section-registry.js js/user-identity.js js/progress-tracker.js js/section-overall-progress.js js/section-loader.js > js/bundle.min.js
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build

author: CCNA Study Guide Team
